title.narrative: Partnership For Transforming Health Services 2 (PATHS 2) Nigeria

description.narrative: The Partnership for Transforming Health Services, Phase 2 (PATHS2), a DFID-funded program in Nigeria, aims to improve the planning, financing and delivery of sustainable and replicable pro-poor health services for common health problems, focusing on five states and the federal government.

activity-date.narrative: The Partnership for Transforming Health Services, Phase 2 (PATHS2), a DFID-funded program in Nigeria, aims to improve the planning, financing and delivery of sustainable and replicable pro-poor health services for common health problems, focusing on two states and the federal government.

description.narrative: Inception to date Actuals as of September 2015.
